response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. Our esteemed company has developed a unique product that holds immense value and potential for significant impact in your field. We believe its worth to you surpasses $1,000,000. After careful consideration, we propose to sell this product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a substantial saving compared to the market value. We are confident that this investment will yield substantial returns for you. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this exceptional deal.", "product_price": 950000}
